name: Happy Birthday (itch)
description:
Welcome to the game Happy Birthday!

Happy Birthday is a retro-flirtatious short that will leave you with a seed for a new perspective. The controls are easy enough for anyone to learn and master.

The game in bullets:

  • No blood
  • No great evil
  • No smug good guy
  • Simple controls
  • 8-bit retro
  • Retro difficulty
  • 5-15 minutes of play-time (there might be some easter eggs, who knows?!)
  • Original soundtrack and sounds
  • Artsy, but actually playable
  • Minimalistic approach to level progress
